name: Simple Spaceshooter
description:
A simple game made solely in WPF and C#, made for my learning purposes only with a game loop implemented in C#'s event system

Controls: 

  • WASD - movement
  • SPACE - shooting
  • Mouse - buying

All graphics used are not mine and were downloaded for free on a website I, unfortunately,  don't remember anymore. Message me if you know the author for credits
